data.eml:eml: A new species of the deep-sea squat lobster genus Eumunida Smith, 1883 (Decapoda: Anomura: Eumunididae) from the Arabian Sea off southwestern India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Chakraborty, Rekha Devi, Paramasivam, Purushothaman, Gidda, Maheswarudu (2019): A new species of the deep-sea squat lobster genus Eumunida Smith, 1883 (Decapoda: Anomura: Eumunididae) from the Arabian Sea off southwestern India. Zootaxa 4590 (4): 440-456, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4590.4.2
